text:
Superpedestrian | Cambridge/Boston, MA | full time, onsite

We're looking for Android and web software engineers. Come help make cycling a compelling and fun alternative to your car! Weâ€™re working on a variety of software products to support the Copenhagen Wheel (check out the demo video at https://superpedestrian.com) and making riding more fun!
